TopicTitle: Low performance due to too much mods ?

Articles.Content:
Hi Kerbals ! Basically what I have done is installed THIS mod with all of its required dependencies. However, I am getting lots of lag and I don't know if it's because of the game, mods or my computer. What I wanted was to make the Kerbol system look more beautiful than it originally is. My FPS drops down to 15-20 even 10 when I am on Kerbin and 20-30 FPS when I am on Duna (I don't have a craft on Eve so I don't know what my FPS will be). I flied around Minmus and the Mun and I haven't had any FPS drops (if I recall correctly it was around 60-70 FPS). So I noticed that I am getting this FPS drop when I am on or near a planed with an atmosphere. These are my PC specs:

CPU: AMD FX 8320 (not overclocked)

GPU: MSI R9 270X OC GAMING EDITION

RAM: KINGSTON HyperX BEAST 2x4GB 1600Mhz

Motherboard: Gigabyte GA-970A-UD3P

HDD: WD Caviar Blue 1TB

PSU: FSP RAIDER 650W Silver

Case: COOLER MASTER N500

Every graphical option in the game is either on or at it's highest option. If you can help me improve my performance, I'll be very thankful

Edited May 13, 2014 by gEshAdve
